MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell affecting properties in Cwrt Y Glowyr and the surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm midday via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15am on the 28th January 2021.
